headline: ComEd Offering $515,000 in Grants to Support Community Programs Across Northern Illinois
summary: CHICAGO, January 12, 2026--ComEd is now accepting grant applications for three of its Power for Good Grant Programs. This year’s annual program will provide a total of $515,000 in funding to municipalities and nonprofit organizations to strengthen environmental sustainability efforts, advance public safety and clean transportation projects and broaden access to arts programs.
